title: University of Denver - Bicycle Master Plan (Rough)

properties.name: Bicycle Boulevard
properties.description: Collaborate with City & County of Denver to convert S. High Street into a bicycle boulevard.Add paint (green sharrow lane)--especially at intersections & parking garages.Convert "Stop" signs to "Yiled to Pedestrians + Bicyclists" signs.Imrpove lighting/visibilityTraffic Circles
